1.応募した記事を キャンセルしますか？|<color_yellow>|※入札金額の: Do you want to cancel the article you|submitted?<color_yellow>A fee of <%nL_FEE>% of the bid amount will be|charged and <%dM_GOLD> gold will be refunded|to the post office...<color_white>|<yesno2><close>

2.『お知らせ優待券』を使って 応募しています。|応募した記事を キャンセルすると|: I used the "Notice Coupon" to apply... If you|cancel your entry, the "Notice Coupon" will|be returned to the post office...<color_yellow>It may take some time to return...<color_white>Do you want to cancel the article you|submitted?<yesno2><close>

3.応募を キャンセルしました。|<color_yellow>|※優待券の返却には|: I've cancelled my application...<color_yellow>Please note that it may take some time to|return the coupon...<color_white>|<end>

4.応募を キャンセルしました。|<color_yellow>|※ゴールドの返却には: I've cancelled my application...<color_yellow>It may take some time to return the gold...<color_white><end>

5.掲載されている記事を 削除します。|入札したゴールドは 返金されませんが|本当に: I'm not going to refund your bid. The gold|you bid on will not be refunded, but are you|sure you want to remove it?<yesno 2><close>

6.掲載されている記事を 削除します。|使用した お知らせ優待券は 返却されませんが: I'd like to delete the article that was|posted. I'd like to know if you're sure you|want to delete the article?<yesno 2><close>

7.掲載された記事を 削除しました。|<end>: I'm deleting the article that was|published...<end>

8.通信エラーのため 処理に失敗しました。|時間をおいて もう一度 お試しください。: Processing failed due to a communication|error. Please wait a moment and try again...<end>

9.掲載開始日が 応募期限を過ぎているため|応募できません。|掲載開始日を 変更して: I can't apply because the start date is past|the deadline... Please change the start|date...<end>

10.お知らせ広場の 説明です！|<br>|お知らせ広場は プレイヤーから絵葉書を募集:
This is a description of the Notice Plaza.|Notice Square is a bulletin board that|invites players to submit postcards, and then|
|posts them as articles in an auction|format... Every day, six postcards are posted|as articles... If you find an article that|
|catches your interest, please like it! to|support us! You can post your favorite|pictures as postcards, introduce your team,|
|or just show off what you're up to in|Astoltia! For more information about the|Announcement Square, please refer to the|
|explanation...

12.この記事には すでに「いいね！」済みです。|同じ記事には １回しか|「いいね！」:
This article has already been liked.|Already... You can only "Like" the same post|once. You can only "Like" the same article|
|once...

This date is not available because another|player has applied using a notice coupon...|Please wait for another date or cancel your|
|reservation...

14.設定した内容で お知らせ広場に 応募します。|本当に よろしいですか？|<yes: I'd like to apply for a position in the|Notify Public Forum. Are you sure you want to|do this?<yesno2><close>

15.入力していない項目が あります。|全ての項目を 入力してください。|<end>: There are some fields that are not filled in.|Please fill in all fields...<end>

16.お知らせ広場に 応募しました！|指定した掲載開始日に|お知らせ広場を ご確認くだ: I've applied to News Square! Please check the|News Square on the specified start date...<end>

What would you like to see a description of?|About News Square Like! About Us How to Apply|Criteria for Being Listed Canceling Your|Application Deleting Your Application While|
|Listed

23.設定した内容で お知らせ優待券を使用して|お知らせ広場に 応募します。|よろしい: I'd like to apply to the announcement square|using the coupon I set up. Are you sure you|want to do this?<yesno2><close>

24.他のプレイヤーが 先に|お知らせ優待券を使用して|応募されたため 応募できません: You can't apply because another player used|the coupon before you...<end>

25.お知らせ広場に 応募したあとでも|「応募をやめる」を 選択することで|応募を キ:
You can cancel your application by selecting|"Cancel Application" even after you have|submitted it to the Announcement Square.|
|However, you can only cancel postcards that|have been submitted up to four days before|they are published... If you wish to cancel|
|your entry, you will be charged a|cancellation fee of <%nL_FEE>% of the bid|amount...

26.お知らせ広場に 絵葉書が掲載されたあとでも|「掲載中の絵葉書を削除」を 選択する:
You can delete a postcard from your article|by selecting "Delete Postcard" even after it|has been posted in the Announcement Square.|
|Please note that even if you delete a|postcard after it has been posted, you will|not get back the gold that you bid on or the|
|gift certificate that you used... Please note|that even if you delete a postcard after it|has been posted, you will not be able to|
|return any of the gold you bid on or any of|the notice coupons you used...

27.お知らせ広場では 掲載されている各絵葉書に|「いいね！」を することができます。:
You can "Like" the postcards in the News|Square. on each postcard... The creator of|the postcard with the most likes The creator|
|of the postcard with the most "Likes" out of|six will receive an "Announcement Gift|Certificate" from the management team... If|
|you use the "Announcement Coupon", your|postcard will be listed for free, and you may|see more postcards from people you support...|
|If you like the postcard, please "Like" it!|If you like the postcards, you can support|them and their creators by liking them...

The first six postcards with the highest bids|from among the postcards submitted on the|same date will be published in the News|
|Square... The first six postcards with the|highest bid amount will be published in the|News Square. If you use the "Notice Ticket",|
|your entry will be... If the content of the|postcard is inappropriate, the postcard will|not be published... Please use the bulletin|
|board with good manners...

29.お知らせ広場は プレイヤーから絵葉書を募集し|オークション形式で 記事として|掲:
This is the first time I've ever seen a|postcard on the Internet. Once posted, the|same article can be viewed on any server, on|
|any continent... To enter, all you need is a|postcard and some gold... Six postcards a|day, in order of the amount of money bid,|
|will be published as articles. Each article|will run for seven days... New articles will|be posted as the date changes, so please stay|
|tuned...

30.お知らせ広場に 応募するには|「応募する」を選択して 「タイトル」「絵葉書」|「:
To apply for a postcard, select "Apply" and|enter the title, postcard, start date, and|bid amount. For the start date, you can set|
|the date from 5 days to 12 days in the|future. If your article is not selected, you|will be refunded the full amount of your|
|bid... Please note that refunds may take some|time...

You can cancel your application until the|postcard is published. Please wait for the|publication date of the submitted|
|postcards...
